sentences.sentence: You may be wondering how I have won so many honors as a commander in chief.
sentences.translation: 你可能想知道，作为一个总司令，我是如何赢得这么多荣誉的。

sentences.sentence: They all did well in school and took honors classes when available, and some skipped grades.
sentences.translation: 他们在学校的表现都很好，有机会时还会参加荣誉课程，而且有些人甚至跳了级。

sentences.sentence: Finally she became so famous that she was invited abroad and received many honors from foreign universities.
sentences.translation: 最后，她出名了，应邀出国并得到了外国大学的许多荣誉。
